lprry

Blog Note Snap Clip Log

Welcome to my site! I live in Burnley, UK, with my wife Victoria, our canine children, and our hens.

On this site I write notes and longer articles about learning to code, exploring, following Burnley FC around the country, and training and racing. I snap images along the way, that appear in my dedicated snaps section. I also record all of my training, run, ride and weigh-in data.

Latest Clip

  • 2025-11-20 - Lovely Podenco swimming video

    bayLee has been visiting Canine Health and Hydro at Rimington for around 18 months now, ever since complications from a then undiagnosed under-active thyroid caused weight gain, muscle wastage, and back pain.

    He is doing really well now, with his weight where it should be, and his pain largely prevented by regular K9 laser and swim sessions here, and ongoing thyroxin medication.

    As you can see, his monthly swim sessions are one of the best bits of my month!

Lee Perry

Based in Burnley, I have been writing about exploring life with @craftedbypanda and our canine children, learning to code, running and cycling, and Burnley FC on the internet since 2004.
